title: Looking for people to play with
body:
I'm learning to be a support main and basically I've been playing for about 4 years but I find having nobody to play with means I don't improve much if at all  since nobody has any constructive criticisms for me to help me learn. I just get flamed and then stop playing because it's no longer fun... I'm looking for chill people to play with who are ok with the fact that I'm not ranked and still basically learning to play the game and won't flame me for every little mistake... maybe I'm asking for too much idk but thought I would try posting and seein if anyone was interested in makin new friends n juss playin some relaxed chill norms. I also have discord if that's desired by people.... 

IGN: Unigoth
Server: OCE

replies.body:
You had me at support main <3
Feel free to add me and play with. Support main so I can help if you're interested
